metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10859 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: git-annex is vulnerable to an Information Exposure when decrypting files. A malicious server for a special remote could trick git-annex into decrypting a file that was encrypted to the user's gpg key. This attack could be used to expose encrypted data that was never stored in git-annex

criterions.comment: git-annex: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
